name: Prompt Surgical Optimizer

keywords: ai prompt engineering llm logic optimization surgical

name: Context Density Calculator

name: Agentic Workflow Designer
info: Design and map complex Agentic Experience (AX) workflows, establishing triggers, logic gates, and mission-critical Human-in-the-Loop validation points.
keywords: agentic ax workflow ai design architecture orchestration
